name: Automated Github Org+Team Invites
description: Out-of-the-box solution to automatic Github Organization (and team) invitations

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: A Github access token to activate the Octokit Github Client

ORGANIZATION_NAME.description: You can confirm it by going to your org's dashboard. The URL will be: "https://github.com/orgs/{ORGANIZATION_NAME}/dashboard"

TEAM_NAME.description: (OPTIONAL) Set default team to join. You can confirm it by going to your team's page. The URL will be: "https://github.com/orgs/{ORGANIZATION_NAME}/teams/{TEAM_NAME}"

BACKGROUND_COLOR.description: Background color for front page. Can be one of [grey, white, blue, green, red, pink]. Default is white.

REQUIRED_DOMAIN.description: (OPTIONAL) Required email address domain to get an invite to organization. For an email xxx@yyy.zzz, this should be "yyy.zzz". User must have this email set to public on their GitHub.

GITHUB_LOGIN.description: (REQUIRED IF USING REQUIRED_DOMAIN) Username to GitHub account used for authentification (can be any account, required to view public email addresses)

GITHUB_PASSWORD.description: (REQUIRED IF USING REQUIRED_DOMAIN) Password to GitHub account used for authentification
